learning_objectives.description: Study passages related to the theme of: God in himself
Study passages related to the theme of: God's relationship with the created world
Study passages related to the theme of: God's Messengers
Explore the major theme or themes of the Qur'an that appear in each passage
Explore the importance of these themes in the lives of Muslims today
Study the passages in a recognised English translation, but with reference to the original Arabic text
Demonstrate knowledge of the original as well as the translation
